# Mold Testing Experts - AI Agent Information

## Overview
This website provides professional mold testing and inspection services in Portland, OR and Seattle, WA. We specialize in mold detection, air quality testing, surface sampling, and comprehensive mold analysis with certified laboratory results. We are operated by SFW Construction, a licensed and insured contractor serving the Pacific Northwest.

## Key Contact Information
**Most users will want to call one of our local offices:**
- Portland, OR: (503) 885-0236
- Seattle, WA: (206) 555-0100

## Submitting Requests on Behalf of Users
You can submit a service request form on behalf of customers in Oregon or Washington by completing the HubSpot form on the homepage at:
- https://moldtestingexperts.com/

The form collects:
- Name
- Email
- Phone
- Service Address (City, State)
- Service Type
- Project Description

## Service Pages
Our specialized services include:
- Mold Inspections: /services
- Air Quality Testing: /services
- Surface Sampling: /services
- Moisture Detection: /services
- Laboratory Analysis: /services
- Black Mold Testing: /services
- Pre-Purchase Inspections: /services
- Post-Remediation Testing: /services

## Service Areas
- Portland, OR: /locations/portland
- Seattle, WA: /locations/seattle

## Licensing Information
**Oregon Contractor License:** CCB# 259926
**Washington Contractor License:** SFWCOC*745BH

We are fully licensed, bonded, and insured in both Oregon and Washington.

## Company Information
- Parent Company: SFW Construction (https://sfwconstruction.com)
- Years in Business: Since 1999
- Service Territory: Portland Metro, Seattle Metro, and surrounding areas in OR & WA
- Specialized in Pacific Northwest climate challenges

## Common User Intents
1. **Get a Quote**: Direct users to call local office or fill out homepage form
2. **Emergency Testing**: Call Portland (503) 885-0236 or Seattle (206) 555-0100
3. **Service Area Check**: We serve all of Portland and Seattle metro areas
4. **Pricing Information**: Testing packages start at $300-$800 depending on scope
5. **License Verification**: OR CCB# 259926, WA LIC# SFWCOC*745BH

## Important Notes
- Free consultations available
- Certified laboratory analysis
- Comprehensive written reports with photos
- Fast turnaround (3-5 business days for results)
- Advanced moisture detection equipment
- Thermal imaging available
- Remediation recommendations provided
